metadata.name: LOVE the fuel of people®
metadata.description:
LOVE the fuel of people®, is a graphic symbol contained in the public work of art "L'amore non fa rumore" that I created in 1998, for the "Luci d'Artista" event, the museum "en plein air" of light installations in Turin (Italy).
This graphic symbol was also registered as a trademark in 2019 and now on Blockchain.
It has marked and will mark a part of my production (both physical and digital) of art and design.
